name: PLEASE HELP ME GET HOME
description:
Hey guys, thanks for checking out or game for the 2020 DM spil jam :).

This year we wanted to see how far it was possible create a gloomy atmosferic world in a 3d inviorment in only 48 hours,
creating everything from scrach including all 3d models, particle effects and neccesary coding.
the game is abount helping a little ghost find his parents in a wierd isometric world.

Controls are available in-game - download game or re-connect controller if gamepad support is wonky.

Entry for YOUTH category

Bolhuis Code and stuff 
Jenno B Art and stuff 
Music by In Love With A Ghost

Everything but music/UI from scratch in < 48 hours

Much love from Jenno B and Danni G
